checklist.bullet: No fees for making purchases abroad
Nothing added on top of the Mastercard exchange rate
Manage your holiday spending with real time in-app notifications
0.5% cashback on all purchases over £1 worldwide
Friendly customer support from anywhere with in-app chat

lowdown.title: Interest rates
lowdown.description:
18.9% per year (variable, representative) for purchases. 

18.9% per year (variable, representative) for cash withdrawals. 

Your final interest rate may be higher based on your individual circumstances.

lowdown.title: Cashback
lowdown.description: Earn 0.5% on every purchase above £1 at home and abroad.

lowdown.title: No fees abroad
lowdown.description: There are no fees for making purchases abroad. Interest will still be charged as normal.

lowdown.title: Cash withdrawals
lowdown.description: You'll be charged interest from the day you withdraw cash in the UK and abroad. There are no fees for withdrawing cash abroad. In the UK you'll be charged a fee of 2.5%, with a minimum charge of £2.50.

lowdown.title: Balance Transfers
lowdown.description: This card doesn't offer balance transfers.

lowdown.title: Fees
lowdown.description:
There is a £12 fee if you make a late payment, or your Direct Debit fails. 

There are no overlimit fees.
